fields.headline: Bar of the week
fields.bodyText: In a city famous for its kitsch, the Regency stands shoulder to shoulder with the Pavilion in questionable interior decorating. Gilt palm trees break up walls papered in giant green stripes, while beige leather sofas nuzzle up to alarming pot plants. It draws a mixed, mainly local crowd. The Sunday roast - meat and vegetarian options - is popular, and the service good. High point: decor Low point: decor Beer: bitter £1.60, San Miguel £2.50 G&T: £2.70 House wine: £8 Food: above average grub Music: low enough for conversation Popular with: a mixed bunch Best for: Sunday lunch
